name: noncancerous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not caused by or involving cancer: She had an operation to treat some noncancerous growths. Around ninety percent of lumps turn out to be non-cancerous.
More examplesFewer examplesShe took ten weeks off work after having a noncancerous tumour removed.Radiation treatment can also be used to treat many noncancerous diseases.The treatment you will be offered depends on whether the tumour is cancerous or noncancerous.The doctors discovered a non-cancerous lump in her liver.
